data.actual_result: The client freezes up and must be closed via task manager
data.expected_result: Nothing, really. The link is dragged, maybe it puts the link in chat for you?
data.short_description: Dragging links posted in a message overloads the unsupported file type dialog box and causes the client to completely freeze up
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: Post a link in chat - Drag that link around for a bit -  Release your drag.
